resources.string:
"Uma unesivikeli sesikrini, faka isivikeli sesikrini ngaphambi kokusetha isigxivizo somunwe sakho ukuze sisebenze kahle.
Ukuze uthole umphumela omuhle, sebenzisa isivikeli sesikrini esinesitifiketi sokuthi Kwenzelwe iGoogle. Kwezinye izivikeli zesikrini, isigxivizo sakho somunwe singase singasebenzi."
Tshekisa umunwe wakho bese uthinta ngethiphu
Vula umunwe bese uthinta ngomphetho wesokunxele
Phenduka futhi bese uthinta ngomphetho ongakwesokudla
Sula isikrini sakho ukuze ususe noma yimiphi imithende, ukungcola, noma amabala. Lokhu kusiza ukuthatha izithombe ezisobala zesigxivizo somunwe.
